subject: Re: [junit] A case for adding logging of assertions to junit
msgSnippet: ... That s quite puzzling.  I can t see how the existence of this feature could ever prevent a developer from writing tests.  Again, these are very orthogonal
messageBody:
On Mon, Jun 9, 2008 at 5:39 PM, J. B. Rainsberger <jbrains762@...> wrote:
> I believe that if JUnit logged its assertions, then
> that would have robbed me of this experience.

That's quite puzzling. I can't see how the existence of this feature
could ever prevent a developer from writing tests. Again, these are
very orthogonal issues: one is about testing your software, the other
is about improving the reports.

--
Cédric
